A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
In my opinion\, this isn't the best Star Wars film\, but it certainly isn't the worst. I appreciated all the space battle scenes. I really loved seeing Carrie Fisher one last time. General Leia really was the heart and soul of the movie. Laura Dern deserves credit for her role. Was really wonderful to see her in it.
The low points...Kylo Ren. Terrible villain. Just whiny and boring. Pace of the film. 

It's a good film. Go see it.
